text.sentence: In response to your email, yes, our confidentiality language was so limited that it did not allow us to provide the agreement to affiliates of either party without consent.
We revised the form about 9 months ago to broaden the langage to include affiliates, but Duke is an old master so they need our consent so they can provide it to their affiliate.
Unless Federico has any reason not to waive the language, I think we can go ahead & draft a waiver up here and send it to Duke.
Can you talk to Federico asap and run that by him and let me know so I can get this over to Duke.
